product_name: Delta Cycle El Greco Ceiling Hoist Bike Storage
long_description: The El Greco Ceiling Hoist from Delta raises and stores a bike up and out of the way. It will also hold a kayak or ladder. Efficient pulley system helps you lift and lower heavy objects. Engineered for long, durable performance; finished in tough silver powder coat. Includes mounting hardware and full instructions for easy installation. Maximum load 50 lbs.
short_description: The El Greco Ceiling Hoist from Delta raises and stores a bike up and out of the way. It will also hold a kayak or ladder.
